title: PRESS DIGEST - Bulgaria - Oct 21
text:
SOFIA, Oct 21 (Reuters) - These are some of the main stories in Bulgarian newspapers on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

TRUD - The new mayor of Sofia is likely to be elected in a run-off one week after the Oct. 27 local election, new opinion poll by Sova Harris showed. Support for current mayor and ruling GERB party member Yordanka Fandakova stood at 31.2%, while backing for independent candidate, backed by opposition Socialists, Maya Manolova, stood at 24.7%, the poll showed.

24 CHASA - Bulgaria will open on Monday some 11 km of a pipeline that will link Bulgaria's gas network with neighbouring Turkey, the first stretch of a gas link that will transport Russian gas from Turk Stream pipeline to central Europe.
